altername_name: Dungeon Master's Assistant: Volume II: Characters & Treasures
name: Dungeon Masters Assistant: Volume II: Characters & Treasures
overview: The program is designed to assist a game master in managing table-top role-playing games such as Dungeons & Dragons and Tunnels & Trolls. A user can input material into the menu-driven program's tables, including random monster appearances, treasure tables, battle elements, and the creation of new monsters and characters.
